_header: So hath mine heart caught in remembrance
_description: ‘Womanly Noblesse — Balade that Chauncier made’ — three 9-line stanzas and 6-line Envoy

BLAdd34360.First Lines:
So hath myn hert caught in remembraunceyowre beaute hoole and
                    stidefast gouernaunce…
BLAdd34360.Last Lines:
…Thynkyng that I have caust caught in
                    remembraunceyowre beaute hole your stidfast gouernaunce
